message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, both Nicole and Joan are ancestors of Olivia. Nicole is connected to Olivia through a chain involving Rebecca (from statements 7, 50, 47, 29, 55, 57, 32, 53, 11, 19, 51, 18, 13, 17, 5, 63, 23, 40, 4, 59, 48, 52, 28, 3, 35, 31, 41, 44, 10, 46, 38, 26, 42, 21, 49, 33, 43, 58, 37, 1, 22, 60, 45), and Joan is connected to Olivia through a chain involving Harold, Randy, and Beverly (from statements 62, 61, 30, 14, 54, 16, 20, 12, 9, 2, 15, 27, 25, 39, 34, 36, 6, 24, 56, 8). Since both Nicole and Joan have Olivia as a descendant, they share a common descendant.

<ANSWER>1</ANSWER>
